name: FLEmailToContactIdentifiers
rule:
INSERT INTO `Contact Identifiers` (`Contact ID`,`type`,`value`)
SELECT e.`Contact ID`,e.`type`,e.`value` FROM (
	SELECT :ContactID AS `Contact ID`,'E-mail' AS `type`,`E-mail 1 - Value` AS `value` FROM GoogleContactMatches gc  WHERE gc.`Custom Field 2 - Value` = :VoterID 
	UNION DISTINCT
	SELECT :ContactID AS `Contact ID`,'Phone' AS `type`,`Phone 1 - Value` AS `value` FROM GoogleContactMatches gc  WHERE gc.`Custom Field 2 - Value` = :VoterID 
	UNION DISTINCT
	SELECT :ContactID AS `Contact ID`,'Phone' AS `type`,`Phone 2 - Value` AS `value` FROM GoogleContactMatches gc  WHERE gc.`Custom Field 2 - Value` = :VoterID 
) e WHERE LENGTH(TRIM(e.`value`)) > 0 AND (
	SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `Contact Identifiers` ci 
	WHERE ci.`Contact ID`=e.`Contact ID` AND
	ci.`type`=e.`type` AND
	ci.`value`=e.`value`
) < 1
